mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device_info( device_id, create_time, update_time, sdk_version, release_version, device_model, brand, host, device_name, hardware_name, language, screen_size ) VALUES( #{deviceId}, now(), now(), #{sdkVersion}, #{releaseVersion}, #{deviceModel}, #{brand}, #{host}, #{deviceName}, #{hardwareName}, #{language}, #{screenSize} );
mapper.select: select sdk_version, release_version, device_model, brand from device_info GROUP BY sdk_version, release_version, device_model, brand
mapper.update:
update device_info
sdk_version = #{deviceInfo.sdkVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
release_version = #{deviceInfo.releaseVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_model = #{deviceInfo.deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand = #{deviceInfo.brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
host = #{deviceInfo.host,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_name = #{deviceInfo.deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hardware_name = #{deviceInfo.hardwareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language = #{deviceInfo.language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
screen_size = #{deviceInfo.screenSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now()
where device_id = #{deviceInfo.deviceId}
